column5: Hi guys I know this is a long shot but I  had a rod and reel blow/bounce out of my boat yesterday on the way to Gloucester pool via Upper Big Chute Rd out of Coldwater and onto Irish Line to MacLean (Black) Lake..if anyone hears anything through the grapevine.. it was a Denali rosewood series spinning rod and a Pfluger president reel  thanks guys Rich
